title: Game Character Demon Voice Sound Effects
description: Game Character Demon is a robust vocal sound effects bank that brings rich and dynamic game ready voice audio assets.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

ESM Team is back with another game character voice pack. Introducing the first of Game Character series - Demon. Game Character Demon is a robust vocal sound effects bank that brings rich and dynamic game ready voice audio assets. Includes over 450+ scripted custom lines, battle cries, fight vocals and everything you need to build a compelling dark antagonist dialogue and in-game audio experiences. Presented in Formats: 44.1k 16Bit. Game Character Demon is built to provide an reliable source bank of epic fantasy vocals, dialogue, and immersive fight and cut scenes in your next epic fantasy adventure production.Â
technicalDetails:
Product Details:

  • 458 Game Ready Voice Audio Assets
  • 15 minutes of audio
  • 646.1 MB of samples
  • Includes Format: 44.1k 16Bit
  • AAA Game Character Voice Sound Effects Library
  • 36 Battle Cries, Roars, Long, Short, Snort
  • 3 Breathing, Deep, Quick
  • 13 Coughing, Hacking, Gross
  • 8 Crying, Slow, Fast
  • 164 Custom Lines like Allow Me to End You, I Shall Deliver You To Your Death
  • 29 Fight Vocals, Hit, Swing, Growl, Grunt
  • 23 Jumping, Short, Long, Double Jump
  • 23 Laughing, Building, Explosive, Low
  • 17 Pain Vocals, Choking, Dying, Short, Long
  • 142 Stock Lines like I Cannot Do That, At Your Service, Draw Swords, I Am Out Of Mana

Number of Audio Waves: 458

Number of Audio Cues: 458

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 15 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5
